== Velur (CT) (627778) ==

Velur (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 12.06 sq. km. and harbouring 3440 households with total population of 13928 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 320 km. Male population is 6675 and female population is 7253. Scheduled Caste population is 1507 and Scheduled Tribes population is 16. Census Location Code of the town is 627778<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 100 km. Railway station is at Wadakkanchery at a distance of 13 km.
